column1: Bo-Katan Kryze: The starfighter on its own is already great, but the figures here are truly something else. Bo-Katan makes her exciting first minifigure debut in this set, and she looks absolutely stellar. Silver beskar armor plates are present on the legs and torso, the scratches and wear on the armor is quite some neat detail. I also like how the brown belt on the torso carries down to the hip print. As with the other 2 figures of the set, she comes equipped with a pearl dark gray Jetpack. The face prints include a smiling and an angry expression, both accurately featuring her headband. Her blue helmet features incredible printing and the antenna is also attached here, and thankfully, Lego included a hair piece so you have the option to swap the helmet out which is very much appreciated. Finally, her accessories are 2 blaster pistols. Overall, this figure blew me away, the prints and detail are beyond fantastic. Some arm printing would&rsquo
column2: ve been nice, especially given the price of the set, but otherwise a perfect figure.

column4: mandalorian, but despite that, this figure is also amazing. The armor and belt details across the torso and legs are once again great. A jetpack is included and underneath the helmet is a plain black head. The pearl dark gray helmet looks really awesome with its blue markings, and finally, the loyalist is equipped with 2 blaster pistols just like Bo-Katan. Overall, a fantastic Mandalorian figure with great extensive detail.

column1: Gar Saxon: The final figure is none other than Gar Saxon, who is another character that&rsquo

Gar comes with a jetpack and a new face print, the stern expression with the stubble beard looks suitable for the character. The new helmet piece with horns here looks stellar and perfectly corresponds with Darth Maul, the silver, red and yellow pattern print looks excellent as well, unfortunately though, no hair piece was provided. Finally, his accessory is a single blaster pistol, I see a missed opportunity to include a simple shield gauntlet build as an additional accessory, which only needed to be comprised of the clear Spider-Man web shooter holder piece and a translucent blue dish, but oh well. Overall, the lack of hair piece and shield gauntlet doesn&rsquo
